history.proof: intros d plp tl H. induction H. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - apply plp_true_cons. + apply IHpl_path_recon. + sfirstorder use: dt_non_empty_fix.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet +.

original: intros d plp tl H. induction H. - intros H1 H2. apply pl_path_true_nil. - intros H1 H2. apply plp_true_cons. + apply IHpl_path_recon. apply H1. + apply H2.
